title: Physical Change and Chemical Change
question: Does not form new substance / Tidak membentuk bahan baharu
The properties of the substances remain the same / Sifat bahan dan hasil sama
The chemical composition of the substances remain the same / Komposisi kimia bahan dan hasil sama
Needs less energy / Memerlukan tenaga yang sedikit
Forms new substance / Membentuk bahan baharu
The properties of the substances and products are not the same / Sifat bahan dan hasil berbeza
The substances and products have different chemical composition / Komposisi kimia bahan dan hasil berbeza
Needs more energy / Memerlukan tenaga yang banyak
